definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: They flew into Mogadishu in Black Hawk helicopters in broad daylight.
sentences.chinese: 他們在大白天乘坐黑鷹直升機飛入了摩加迪沙。

sentences.english: She had her handbag robbed in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 她的手提包在大白天裏給人搶去了。

sentences.english: He had returned home while it was still broad daylight.
sentences.chinese: 那天，大白天他便回了家。

sentences.english: Are you dreaming in the broad day light?
sentences.chinese: 這大白天的你怎麼淨說夢話呀？

sentences.english: What do you need that for , madwoman ? broad daylight , midday , 4 p . m .
sentences.chinese: 你到底要什麼，瘋婆子？大白天的，才下午4點。

sentences.english: The car was stolen in broad daylight.
sentences.chinese: 那輛汽車大白天被人偷走了。

sentences.english: 'He just appeared in broad daylight, ' one of the witnesses said.
sentences.chinese: 一位目擊者說，他是在大白天來的。

sentences.english: The curtains, naturally, are closed against the daylight.
sentences.chinese: 至於窗簾嘛，自然是在大白天也拉着的。

sentences.english: And you'd probably have to stop halfway through the day to plug in somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 而且你可能不得以大白天停在半路，去某處充電。

sentences.english: It was still daylight but all the cars had their headlights on.
sentences.chinese: 還是大白天，但所有汽車的前燈都亮起來了。

definition: the full light of day (idiom)/fig. peace and prosperity/in broad daylight
in broad daylight/in the middle of the day/KMT emblem, a white sun on a blue background
in the depth of night/late at night
in the depth of the night/very late at night
midnight/in the middle of the night
a single man and a single woman/bachelors/a man and a woman together (typically in a secluded setting)
lit. the black sky of midnight/very late at night (idiom)
